so right away you have a conversation you're having with a cashier and so

where they're asking a question and you're giving a response back so that's request response between the cashier and

the fry station over here which is where all the good stuff is so when you place
an order the cashier doesn't go around to every single person and say okay I need you to make a burger I need you to
make some fries I need you to make the make the lettuce and instead what they're doing is they're broadcasting the order out to all the different
stations in order for the stations to make their food so the stations don't have to directly communicate to the
cashier in order to figure out what they need to make so we have here as a form of pubsub where each of these different
stations are being notified off a single message saying this is the thing you need
the other thing we have is the cashier is writing the order down so they're writing exactly what the person is
ordered and that is the thing that actually gets passed to all the different stations so these people at
these different stations don't directly have to talk to the order the the received person here instead they're
receiving it asynchronously so the cashier never has to directly interact with each of the stations so the next
patterns we have are we have a asynchronous version of communication we
have durable messages and we have a broadcast that has one message going out to all the different stations so far so
good okay now the last piece is to actually take all the different parts of
the order and then combine them into the thing that you actually get in order to do that requires a little bit of coordination so we want to make sure
they have a very efficient parallel processing of our order so the burger is being made at the same time as a fries
it's not a sequential set of processing and so because we're doing things kind of asynchronously we have to have

to Starbucks or what's the what's actually good coffee shop burn I don't

of the order is done this person will go look to see which these trays matches up
